conditions: Melanoma, Myelodysplastic Syndrome, Multiple Myeloma, Lymphoma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To establish an electronic registry to store information from patients who have provided their consent allowing use of their tissue sample(s) for future testing.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients must be \>= 18 years of age.
* Patients must be able to provide written informed consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not Applicable
